Прекрасная игра. Тут:
1) Тебе может прилететь в голову топор, в момент, когда ты "вроде в безопасности" 
2) Ты поймёшь (или убедишься), что клоуны - зло
3) Ты испытаешь весь спектр чувств и эмоций за какие-то несколько минут (побочное действие: оставишь часть своих нервов)
4) Поймёшь, что если твои друзья носят капюшоны, тот тот парень в самом дальнем конце карты НЕ ФАКТ, что один из них
5) Фраза "Да я успел" засияет новыми красками
6) Перестанешь доверять друзьям или ваша связь наоборот укрепиться (но скорее первое)
Ну а за другую сторону:
1) Бей, вешай, убивай, ломай... Короче, веселись как хочешь

With the addition of long ban timers this game has been falling off the radar for me for a long time. I play on PC and Ps4 so who knows how many hours I have in this game. I don't appreciate the increased ban times for leaving games that are intentionally played the worst way possible. It seems no matter what happens the game is killers favor cause in reality the Killer is the much easier choice. You have nothing to fear except not getting any bloodpoints or not fully completing challenges. As the killer in many games I feel bad for doing really well and let people go cause ultimately some killers have it very easy while others are fun to play against as survivor. Killers get no punishment for anything in game as long as they arent cheating while  survivors often have more of a reason to leave games early cause killers can face camp or you feel like the killer is using everything in their power to only go for a single person the whole game. This can be frustrating to play against but it isn't all bad. You do need to play for a long time to get worthwhile abilities which I personally feel is easier as a Killer. Sharing only your strongest perks to get survivors as hopeless as possible is a good strategy but again is completely unavoidable as a survivor. You have 0 way of knowing who you are against until the game starts. Ranks means absolutely nothing other than you leave games less and do okay each game. I don't really have a problem with all the killers just the ones that suppress your ability to do anything useful. Some people probably might think I'm complaining as a survivor main but I play both sides and High level survivors can be hard to deal with but not that cross platform is available players face a better amount of skill levels . Only reason I don't recommend this game is when it's played incorrectly it can be one of the most irritating experiences of your gaming life. I understand no one likes people disconnecting but punishing them worse and worse for each offense is harsh considering I have no clue who the killer is or what perks my fellow survivors have until I'm in game. On ps4 i am banned for 17 hours cause i left 1 game today. Not worth playing anymore if I'm forced to die early cause a killer camped me with no repercussions while if I leave the game I can no longer play for the rest of the day. That's my whole issue.
Buen juego, divertido con amigos o en solo tambien :3.

Buen juego, entretiene y es más divertido si lo juegas junto con amigos, como todo, tiene algunos errores, algunos más singulares y, sin duda, pueden llegar a ocasionarte alguna experiencia de juego un tanto amarga, pero aún así es un gran juego que cumplirá con su función de divertirte y entretener,

El juego está bien, es muy divertido PERO. Hay muchos bugs que hacen este juego algo "único". A veces dan risa, rara vez perjudican. 

Cosas a tener en cuenta antes de comprar: 

1- A veces hay problemas de desconexion, incluso cuando el internet está bien. (Desconexiones random en el lobby, en partida, en la tienda o en el medio de una partida)

2- En cada parche nuevo, hay un nuevo bug. (Como mencioné antes tampoco es algo que afecte en sobre manera la experiencia de juego, pero no se puede negar que son molestos algunas veces)

3- El matchmaking no está del todo bien, hay unos ajustes pendientes por hacer, a veces te dan colas de 10 minutos y agh, da flojera. (Para jugar asesino normalmente el matchmaking es más rápido)

Hi, I'm a Gen Jockey, Heartbeats terrify me! My 4 perks are Urban Evasion for Sneaking Around, Self Care because I Need to be full health at all times and i don't want to waste a medkit, Spine Chill so i know when the killer glances in my direction and last but not least Windows of Opportunity, so i know where to find pallets to drop to slow down the killer! When i play Killer, i Main Doctor, because i have absolutely no skill with finding survivors. Thank you for coming to my Ted Talk
I hate this game dont ask why
worst game ever. i play it when i have any free time.

Bought this game back in 2019 and didn't start playing again until recently. I stopped playing since there used to be a very long wait time if you queued as a killer. That seems to have been fixed now due to cross play. Find matches as survivor or killer between 2 and 5 minutes. The longest i've waited in any queue so far has been 8 minutes but that was during off hours and that was only once. But here's roughly what you can expect.

-you will die a lot
-you will lose a lot
-you will buy dlc because some killers are too stronk to not have
-you will get salty
-You will die and you will lose a lot
-you will be called names by others
- you will more than likely experience lag a good number of times and other connection issues because the servers still seem to be as bad as they were previously
- you will also likely miss attacks and hooks as killer, or get hit when you shouldnt have as survivor for the same reasons mentioned above
-You will die a lose some more
-Killers at low levels tend to face camp A LOT
-You will rage
-You will get stuck on things you shouldn't get stuck on
-You will probably have quitters if you play as survivor solo queuing more often than not
- Also you will die and you will lose a lot (just in case you didn't see it before)

Its a solid game if the type of game interests you at all though. Plus, now is a good time to get in seeing as the next update will buff tea bagging and allow you to punt a baby. If you do buy this game, have fun and enjoy losing and dying a lot :D
THIS IS THE BEST GAME EVER CREATED!
Excelente juego muy divertido logros desafiantes recomebdable al 100%
Some of the most engaging multiplayer gameplay I've ever experienced

É um jogo muito legal, pois tem killers de outras franquias de filmes de terror icônicos, como é o caso do Freddy Krueger e o LeatherFace, e também pela criatividade dos desenvolvedores em relação a criação de killers para o jogo. Espero que venha mais killers de outras franquias mais pra frente, como por exemplo o Hellraiser, o Alien ou até mesmo animatronics de FNAF, pois como disse o desenvolvedor do jogo: "Tudo é possível"

игра класс! заходишь начинаешь матч сразу бежишь к маньяку и сливаешься потому, что ты ебаный  новичёк и тебе все равно надерут зад), а если ты уже средний по времени игрок который более менее умеет убегать и маньсить,  тогда смело могу сказать, что спасать своих дело хуйня можешь бежать беги забей на этих утырков. 
А теперь для профи (как же вы заебали маньяков ) кхм-кхм так вот вы просто не уловимая машина которую хуй догонишь, хуй найдёшь. вы мышь, вы ленивец и вы сука слон, но при всем при этом вы будто призрак. Кратко говоря иди те нахуй с такими выжившими.

DBD tiene una comunidad muy toxica. Asesinos que campean, sobrevivientes que te dejan morir, la gente se desconecta al ver que van perdiendo... Pero vamos, que este juego se trata de asesinos despiadados cazando a cuatro jugadores, jugadores que lo único que quieren es sobrevivir... así que... sí, creo que esta bien. Si tienes poca tolerancia al fracaso y te pones nervioso facilmente este NO es tu juego.

This game's fun to play with friends, though people in public matches may be toxic but that didn't exactly ruin my fun that this game brought to me. As a killer, it's fun throwing hatchets at the survivors as The Huntress, and also fun dashing and bashing with The Oni. Me also playing as one of the survivors was fun, since being chased was surprisingly fun. You vault, pallet stun, mind game. Great experience I've received from this product. Yes, there are plenty of bugs and you can't do anything about it until the developers fix them. I still had a great experience, and some of the bugs- like when you're not even hanging on the hook, was funny. Lol. But you should really get this game, and play with friends when you can.
